import { BsLinkedin, BsGithub } from 'react-icons/bs' import {InkPen} from '../assets/InkPen.jsx' import {CartoonGuy} from '../assets/CartoonGuy.jsx' import { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {gsap} from 'gsap' import { useSound } from 'use-sound' import waterDrop from '../assets/waterdrop.mp3' export const ContactMe = ({bg}) => { const [play] = useSound( waterDrop, {volume: 0.5} ) useEffect(() => { if((window.innerheight + window.pageyoffset) >= document.body.offsetheight - 2){ console.log('dfdfd') const drop = document.getElementById('drop') const pen = document.getElementById('inkpen') const lastBottom = document.getElementById('lastBottom') const place = document.getElementById('place') place.style.borderRadius = '100%' drop.style.position = 'absolute'; drop.style.bottom = 7 + 'px' drop.style.left = pen.offsetLeft + 'px' gsap.to(drop, {bottom: `${-lastBottom.offsetTop/1.8}px`, opacity: 0, duration: 1, repeat: -1, onRepeat: () => play()}) } }, []) return (

You are out of Ink

Contact me if you want more.

) }
